website_summaries.verdict: If set up correctly, this mount will stand to potholes. Fits a variety of phone sizes, is relatively easy to install, and will protect your vents.
pros: Easily transported from one vehicle to the next, this mount clips to vents versus sticking to your dashboard
Arrives with thin yet sturdy plates that won't overwhelm your car's interior
2 mounts for less than the typical price for one
cons: May require some trial and error in terms of fitting it successfully in your vents

customer_reviews.title: My biggest concern about this product was if it was ...
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern about this product was if it was going hold my galaxy note s7 edge while driving and hitting potholes. Trust me it will hold up! However if you clip the magnet into the large opening it will shake and ur phone will tilt around and move on you. Make sure you use the side that has the smaller opening. Picture included to make it easier to understand. As I was using the product I hit a major pothole and I could of sworn it wasn't going to hold up... But it did. I removed my windshield phone holder in order to use this.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong enough magnet to handle even smooth driving
customer_reviews.text: The magnet felt powerful until we actually tried to use this in the car. Even with the plate directly on the back of the case - and driving on a smooth road - the phone slides down and off the mount. It falls to the floor and completely defeats the purpose of the mount, not to mention that it could damage your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these things to hold my iPhone 7 in a 2016 F-150. The first time I turned a corner, my phone fell on the floor. Every bump in the road sent it flying. The magnet is simply too weak for it to work. UPDATE: After they saw my honest review of their product, Maxboost contacted me and offered me a $40 gift card. Seemed nice, but then I found out the offer was contingent on me removing my review. I'll stand by my review.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dietmann

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work With Wireless Charger
customer_reviews.text: The metal plate that attaches to the backside of the case blocked the ability of my wireless charger to work.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Cannot support phones like Huawei Mate Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have circular air vents on my Jeep Wrangler and I cannot use this product with my Huawei Mate Pro without it constantly lowering the louvre due to the weight of the phone, which I fee is comparable to current iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: Academics Online

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone X. Not a large phone or sized phone, but the magnets are not strong. Maybe my magnets are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Ho

customer_reviews.title: Awful for cases that aren’t smooth
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive circle is pretty big and I wouldn’t want it on my phone. I’d only want it on a case. Wouldn’t fit inside my case or on the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rippedgeek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My phone doesn’t stay on it long. The magnet isn’t very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I have an otter box phone case (it only covers the back, I have glass screen on the screen) and I’m not sure if my case is too thick or the metal/magnetic aren’t strong enough, but while driving my phone flew off and the glass screen shattered. I tried again with the device and my phone flew off and cracked even more. Waste of money, I don’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet?
customer_reviews.text: Take chances of scatching phone and when I used it, it wouldn’t hold worth a darn.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Dale

customer_reviews.title: At first they worked and not it does not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: At first they worked and not it does not stay in onto the air vent. Every time I'm driving and stick on my phone it falls.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, I compared to others before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So far very pleased. Magnets hold well if metal plate properly centered. Came with 4 plates. 2 rectangle and 2 circle. Two different clip gaps. Kept pulling loose when removing device. Used the tighter gap and rubber wont scuff car vents. Balanced pressed on above adjuster to prevent movement. You can rotate emblem text if you are ocd about such things. Put a plate inside phone case attached to phone side as its covered in zagg to prevent rubbing from dirt. Tablet is not in zagg and I didnt want the plate stuck to the tablet or on case interior rubbing against the tablet. Adheres to case well. Plates are really thin.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me...
customer_reviews.text: The vent magnet didn't work for my 2027 Maxima. It is slightly short and doesn't clear the vent directional switch. The vent magnet is very strong. It frequently stays attached to the phone magnet and pulls out of the vent. Didn't work for me.The seller didn't follow through with credit as promised. Just wanted my review removed....
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put on, then it swivels back and forth the entire time so you cant use your GPS. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this one
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this one. We ordered these before our road trip because it would be easier to follow the navigation with this car mount. Unfortunately, my magnet on my phone fell off completely within a few days. Waste of money in my opinion. I would of enjoyed it if it lasted though, the few days it did work I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I went through both sticker magnets on my phone within a month! Although it was good until the magnetic sticker fell off, it was then useless to me. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: THEY DONT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts and it was the worst thing I ever did. Family members were afraid to tell me how bad they were until I saw that my husband wasn’t even using it. They would not stay on if you went over a pothole and such Bought them because of the reviews but as I see now reviews aren’t always correct. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The magnet wasn't strong enough to hold my iPhone 7 in place
customer_reviews.author: calitrav

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it fell apart in two months
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it fell apart in two months. The top round part came off and I can't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Pochacco

customer_reviews.title: Not strong.
customer_reviews.text: My phone (iphone8+) was too heavy and it wouldn’t hold properly. It kept tilting over!
customer_reviews.author: Letty L

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is complete trash.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive is complete trash, phone fell within 10 minutes of use. Might try some gorilla glue to keep it on but that is not the point.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Very weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: This product is very similar to another product I own that was a couple of dollars more. This product is very weak compared to the other one. The other product holds a Google pixel 2 XL eith a case with no problem. However this one not even without a case it doesn't hold well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Techpro212

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: They offered me a bribe if i deleted my original review but did not keep their word so i am rewriting my reviews. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS. I currently drive a 2019 Jeep Wrangler and i have no doors, everytime ne i go around a curb my phone will literally slide off of the mount. So i thought i did something wrong and i reread the instructions, turns out i did everything right. the magnetic connection is just to terrible to keep my phone in place. it’s not worth the trouble so just keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY!!! PHONE BROKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this negative stars I would. Upon using it, my husband's phone flew off of it and broke. He was planning on trading it in for another phone and now he can't. This product just cost us $300!! Steer clear!! Edited to add: several months later, the company reached out to me to try to remedy the situation. They seem like they are starting to care about bad reviews. We will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my case that has a metal plate on the back. My only complaint is that the magnet and phone obstruct the vent so no air circulates. Probably not an issue in most cars but my CRV doesn’t blow air equally from all vents. I’m right handed so the vent to the drivers right is blocked - and of course the middle vents are the ones that have the highest airflow. Easy to install and remove. I only have 2 car so I use the spare as a pop socket when I’m home.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E. Brugh

customer_reviews.title: Magnets, how do they work? See for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my other mount that decided to stop sticking to my windshield. Much simpler to use, doesn't budge while driving, and I can leave it attached to my car vent (2013 Toyota RAV4). I have vertical vents but this works the same regardless if your vents are horizontal or vertical. Since I have a wallet case (sold by Dreem) with an included shell for my phone (iPhone 6), my phone easily attaches to this mount since it already has a metal plate inside. Bottom line, buy this and don't waste time with a windshield mount!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPhone 11 pro
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the air vents. Just push the magnetic part on to the vents and you’re all done. I have the magnetic case so things are very simple. They provide metal backings you can place on your case to give an attachment point. Two come in a pack so you can give one away or place in another car. Holds your phone very well, even on the bumpiest roads. Highly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 2 stars since a review representative contacted me to temporarily remove my review in exchange for a credit. The product did not last 5 days. The black magnet portion that attaches to the phone would not stick, therefore it would not attach to the 2 other magnets (the mount portion nor the magnet portion inside the case).
customer_reviews.author: Keeyhla

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would be amazing based on the reviews. It was easy to install onto my car vent and insert the sticky adhesive onto my phone. HOWEVER, I live in the city. My roads are not rocky mountain bumpy or dangerously potholed streets. This product could not handle my Philadelphia roads. My phone fell off of the vent magnet multiple times. Therefore, if you have slightly bumpy roads, this might not be the best product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Le

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: To begin with the packaging, I completely adored it. I liked the fact how two mounts were packed in such a small box. The product came along with easy to follow diections except for how to use the proective tape. I've used the round metallic plate on my phone so far and its working like a charm. I I have given it 4 stars for the fact that initially the plate was peeling away from the phone while taking the phone off the holder but now its stuck and is working fine. This product is way inexpensive for the quality and quantity of two. I'll definitely be recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anjali

customer_reviews.title: Great phone holder
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first that it would have enough strength to hold my phone (Galaxy S20+) and not let it fall off when I hit big bumps, however, that is not the case with this. It has great holding power since it uses 4 magnets. The soft fingers on the back also grab the vent slats firmly, even ones that are vertical, but do not seem to damage them or slip/move when driving. *Caution* If your phone uses a magnitometer for direction/compass this holder, and others like it, will interfere with it. Most new phones however use a gyroscope which the magnets will not interfere with.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, but Wireless Charging Issues
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that in order for a product to be magnetic and work properly, metal has to be used. Being that there needs to be metal in the same area that has to sit on a wireless charger that it will interfere with the wireless charging feature. However, if you're like me and still use cables to charge, you'll have no issues and these mounts do EXACTLY what they were designed to do. Makes using navigation on your phone super easy since you can put the phone at eye level instead of holding it or putting it in your lap. Very satisfied with the product and excellent buy for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Vaxene

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stay put .... Save you $$
customer_reviews.text: Started off great for a few days .. I'm on my 2nd magnetic circle piece that keeps coming unglued/unstick from phone . Causing my phone to drop. Luckily my phone hasn't broke yet .. save your money
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic will not stick to my phone case. This is worthless to me now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Great for mounting your phone to your dash without a suction cup, the magnets are nice and strong, I don't even have the magnet attached to my phone, it's simply placed between the case and the phone itself. My only issue is more my care manufacturer than anything else, the fins on my vents are extra wide, and this device has trouble staying put, but I run into that with ANYTHING meant to go on vent fins. So, saying that, I'd recommend this as long as you have average or smaller vent fins, If you've got oddly shaped or extra-thick fins it might not work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist product does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, but highly effective. We have a SmartCar and a Toyota Prius. These minimalist device easily inserts into the vents of both vehicles. Both our iPhones have cases. I simply installed the included magnets between the case and the iPhone. Our Prius has a built in navigation system, but when we're on a trip I turn on the WAZE app to keep track of traffic congestion. This car mount provides me with a way to do both. For the SmartCar I purchased a device to integrate a Smart Phone with the car's entertainment system. It cost $100, and, while it works fine, the Car Mount works just as well, for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Butzin

customer_reviews.title: Works well, will fall off on big bumps.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I slipped the magnetic piece in between the hard shell of my case and the rubber part without even using the adhesive and it works well. The base just slips into the vent and holds tight. Only negative is that if I go over a sudden bump - like a pothole - it will fall. Does not fall from typical driving. But I wouldn't recommend it for country roads, washboard, 4WD or anything like that. For the price, ease of installation, and driving on paved roads I recommend it. (Comes with two bases and several choices of magnets for each base)
customer_reviews.author: olddude

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I was very skeptical that these would stay put on the air vents, especially on a pop socket. Glad I was wrong. They are very sturdy and the round magnet fits my pop socket perfectly and stays on. What's even better is that there are two so I keep one in my car and the other I take when I travel and in a rental car. These are would be a great value for one so it's a steal for two!
customer_reviews.author: readyornot

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and the price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnetic hold that very quickly & easily grips securely to vents! I really love the small size too! Anything larger is just unnecessary in my opinion. The only problem I've run into is that with the magnet in, I can't wirelessly charge my Galaxy S10. However, I value the convenience of the mount slightly more than wirelessly charging. Plus, I wouldn't adhere the magnet to my phone or case anyways so I guess it's easy enough to pop the phone case halfway off to take out the magnet for wireless charging then pop it back in between the phone and the case when charging is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Magnet holds very good
customer_reviews.text: The magnet holds very good. I have been using it for about a month and the phone has not fallen off yet. The mount that goes in your vent holds on to the vent very well also. Other brands that I have tried I have always had to glue the mount to the vent. Over all you can not beat this especially not for this price.
customer_reviews.author: bruce barrett

customer_reviews.title: Solid Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is solid. If phone stuck there, it does not move even in the fast driving. So pretty secure. I have 2 phones. one with cover and one without cover. The phone with cover, I just kept the magnet inside the cover and it stick pretty well with this Mount. So pretty good use for this phone. The phone without cover, I tried to stick the magnetic tile behind the phone and try to put it on top of the mount. Worked well at that time. When I tried to remove, the tile got stuck at mount only. The adhesion is not good compare to the magnetic power.
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan Talsania

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: This package contains two magnetic air-vent mounts with strong magnets (probably neodymium/ rare earth) and four adhesive metal plates, for under $10 (actually, under $8). These magnetic mounts can hold even through relatively thick covers, such as the ones have a layer of liquid and glitter sandwiched between two pieces of plastic. The mounts hold securely to the vents of my husband's and my cars (a 2016 Corolla and a 2017 Prius), but are easy to move in search of an optimum position. I think it would be easy to take one with us while traveling, to use in the rental car. The mounts are inexpensive enough that one could buy another set specifically for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: good product but partially blocks your vent.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these were a steal. I got them on a lightning round and were inexpensive enough that it was worth the risk. The magnet is strong and it holds the phone as promised. The only downside that I have found is that when it is 100 degrees outside, I prefer to have my air conditioning vent unobstructed. If you move the magnet on your phone to the bottom this helps but it gives it less of a grip on the phone. If you place it in the middle where intended, it blocks the vent. So I am working on this and trying to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite sure the magnet in these would hold my heavy Samsung Note 9, but it does quite easily. So easy and clean to use without even having to see it in the dark at night. Very good. This is my 4th phone mount and by far the best I have used yet. Two per pack makes sharing one very nice or using it in second vehicle or on the other side for the front passenger. This will not work if your case uses a plastic finger mount. Mine is metal that folds flat and it works fine with that. It's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPhone X and iPhone 8 Plus and Nissan Versa
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to write a quick review to say that these things really work well! I was skeptical because of the cost and there are some bad reviews but I assure you they work great! They hold me iPhone X and my wife’s 8 plus that has an otter box and wallet case on the outside. They are sturdy. Does not move with bumbs. We have a Nissan Versa
customer_reviews.author: Sally Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Very handy but not for wireless charging
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone as a gift, they said by a miracle chance they realized after leaving their phone on its wireless charger for a while, when they went to take the phone off the charger that it was burning hot and glowing red with heat!!! Miracle a fire or phone damage didn't occur! Now this is NOT the fault of the products, just know that if using a metal plate located within your phone case you CANNOT use wireless charging, must use only regular plugged in wired charging.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Vent Clips!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We originally bought a single 2 pack, one for her car and one for mine. We bought another pack for the passenger side of each vehicle as well. These work great! We did not use the adhesive to stick the magnet to our phones, just simply slipped it inside our phone cases and that works fine for us. These are an instant upgrade to the vent clips in my opinion, because the magnets are much easier to use and I believe that they are more sturdy because the clip does not come off the vent when I take my phone off of it. We bought a third pack as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: I want to say that I use this but I don’t since then magnets are too strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and it worked really well but maybe too well. The magnets are so strong that after I started using this my gps navigation system wouldn’t work on any of my map apps. The gps could no longer locate or pinpoint my exact location so all any map app became useless. I actually don’t know if the magnet contributed to the break down of the gps in my phone or If it was just a timely coincidence. I got a new phone but am afraid to use this, just incase it can stop my gps from working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than blocking a vent, mine works like a dream come true on my Boost Mobile ZTE Max XL
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 4 magnets for the back of your devices. I had to mess around with the part that attaches to the ac vent. I turned it trying all the little teeth / grooves and when it went on good it was stuck and tightly secure. Before that it was pulling out with the magnet because the magnet is so strong but after a got the base in right on the vent, this thing held like a charm. I appreciate this practical solution. Only thing I am concerned about really is blocking the vent. It is probably strong enough to hold my Amazon Fire HD 8.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so these do work as designed BUT they do not work with all air vents and they don't swivel. I have the mounted ones that swivel in my personal car but wanted some I could travel with and use in rentals since i use my phone for navigation when traveling. I tried them in my first rental today and it had the big round vents and the vent could not hold the phone in place. Ugh!! The swivel feature is super helpful do you can turn the phone toward you!! These are cheaper and work most of the time for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: It's the small things...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect way to keep your phone available and easily take it with you, with such simplicity. Even though you need to add the small little piece of metal in your phone, its small and flat enough to fit under the case with no indication that it's even there. And I charge my phone wireless at work and home and the small piece of metal doesn't interfere. The magnetic suction is strong enough to hold my phone and still easy enough to pull away when I'm ready to go. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: got it fast....as always with amazom
customer_reviews.text: i first installed the metal circle inside thge case between phone and case hoping that thru the case it would draw enogh magnetism to hold decently...but found it kept falling off so had to adhere it to outside of case and since thge adhesive didnt hold it on there.finally just put a small drab of superglue to it and its holding now .....comes in nice fr google maps directions ...its right there,,,rather than laying flat on your passenger seat,,,,theres a lot here on amazon but i went with the cheapist and it works like a dream
customer_reviews.author: forrest green

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, bought one for 15 bucks and still working!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought just one for like 15 bucks agos 3 years ago and working, seen they are 2 for 10 now and thriving is a good sign!!! bought these out of sheer replacement, nothing wrong with my old ones... so i recommend buying this style its very reliable... the brand doesnt matter but this style in general just works... unfortunately for the style of AC grates on my new car this wont work so i will have to buy different but its not this items fault its my cars placement.. but overall for my older car this item worked very well...
customer_reviews.author: vaderskies

customer_reviews.title: Not happy wish I can get a refund to be honest SORRY
customer_reviews.text: Sorry. This is not a good review... I was really hoping this product would work for me as I drive for a living. But during bumpy roads it kept dropping my phone. Not only was this very frustrating but extremely dangerous as I would sometime need to try to fish for my phone as it fell under the gas and break pedals but decided the chance was not worth the risk. Had to actually pull over to the side of the road with hazards to get my phone 😕😔
customer_reviews.author: Lisie

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: It is def not the best, but not the worst. It's not easy to change the direction of your phone while mounted, w/o the mount coming off my vent. I have tried it with and w/o my phone case. W/o works best, but its a pain to remove. My phone in its rubber case is a lil heavy, and it has flown off while driving. The mount has come off with it. It was a good value. If you are a slow and steady driver it's probably fine.... but I drive it like I stole it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnetic hold and vent grip. Fits on the defrost corner vents on my 2005 Infiniti G35x sedan.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on the fixed defrost corner vents on my 2005 Infiniti G35x sedan. Best mounted / slipped onto vent ribs that have no vertical motion. Used with the Attom Tech Ultra Thin Cell Phone Ring Stand. Works and looks great! Magnets deliver a good, strong hold. From some reviews, it sounds like the rubber surface can dry out, get hard, and lose grip over time given the extremes of heat and cold inside a car. Recommend using tape deck rubber roller cleaner / conditioner fluid - wipe on, wipe off reconditioning of dried out rubber surfaces - restores tackiness.
customer_reviews.author: The Frugal Gearhead

customer_reviews.title: Maxboost Car Mount (2pk) Phone Car Mounts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly as described. Magnets are strong. Fit snug and tight in my vents. Don’t fall off while I’m driving. Only one time so far but it was a pretty big bump and I didn’t really have it all the way on the magnet and it fell off but when placed directly on magnet does not fall off. I like that I can place the one inside my case. I didn’t even adhere it to my phone nor case just slid it between and it stays put. Would definitely purchase again and highly recommend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MysticMerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very strong
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came with two. I keep one in both my cars. The magnet is very strong and sturdy. The rubber part over the metal prongs sometimes gets stuck in the vent when I try to remove it, but it’s an easy fix. It comes with 2 circle and 2 rectangle magnets. The magnets have an adhesive back to stick onto your phone or case. Then you can just pop it onto your magnetic mount in the car and it will hold. Great for hands-free calls or navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with a modification
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drive hands free on my older model car that lacks Bluetooth. There are two in the package so I just attached it in our newer vehicle as well. I have a pocket on the back of my phone case and the adhesion from the plate did not hold. However, I slid the plate into the pocket (in front of my ID, etc.) and it works great. For the money this is a good solution for me. I don’t know how that adhesive would be directly on the case. Probably better than the slippery rubber the pocket is made from.
customer_reviews.author: JayJay

customer_reviews.title: Super Magnet
customer_reviews.text: I bought a phone case with the built in magnet and stick my phone on this while driving. It works great! I can easily read navigation or listen music. Perfect handsfree device and nothing permanently stuck to my dash. I can have one in each car or take it with me if I'm riding with someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Sage Leah

customer_reviews.title: Phone won't stay put!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me at all. I tried a friend's product which was similar and I LOVED it. I was highly disappointed when my phone first fell while driving. Could no longer hear navigation, so I had to pull over to resituate the phone. I've tried several different times to get this to work and read the reviews to see if I was missing something...but nope. Nothing worked. Highly disappointed and I was unable to return it during the 30 day return period.
customer_reviews.author: Kramgurl

customer_reviews.title: Clean, simple, and close-to-perfect phone mount.
customer_reviews.text: This simple device works great on my Subaru's air vents. I slide the phone off sideways to keep from pulling the device off the vent fin, but that's no problem. I have a fairly thin phone cover, so the metal disk fits between phone and cover without using the included stickum disk. It works perfectly, and neither mount nor phone moves when the car bounces, so it's very secure. I've given them as gifts, I like them so much. If your vent fins are more horizontal than vertical, the phone's screen won't be very visible to you, but it would still work as a hands' free phone, and a quick and easy place to keep your phone when driving.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: BEST HANDS FREE PHONE MOUNT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: When I started using this magnet hands free phone support I asked myself why I didn’t knew about it before?! I think that says it all. This is perfect. Specially for me that I need to mount and unmount my phone too often. Looking back, I believe I’ve been spending too much money on rubbish. You can either stick the piece on metal to your phone or keep in between your phone and it’s case. Either way works. I really love it and had great value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I seperated the set between two vehicles. The product is well designed with good holding power. One phone is an easy on, each time I enter a car. The second phone already had a finger clip on the phone. Short of removing the finger clip, the magnetic piece is forced to be mounted somewhat off-center. So....they designed it well....I need to remove the finger clip on one of my phones to get both phones to work best. For a reasonable price you are given to car holders that work great!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Versatile out of sight functionality
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent quality, especially for the price. The magnet can easily be put between case and phone and is strong enough to hold phone in place this way without even attaching to phone. With an otter box case it initially wasn’t strong enough, but then I put the metal piece between the hard and soft otter box pieces and it works perfectly. Getting 4 pieces of metal and two vent attachments is great for versatility and since I haven’t even had to attach the metal to anything it will work for future phones to come.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah2875

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to hold my iPhone to know how to get to the place I wasn't sure I knew how to get too. With two of the holders my wife and I will use both our phones in holders traveling 2500 miles and have at least two different programs to look at as we want to.
customer_reviews.author: Grape

customer_reviews.title: Works For Large Phones with Thick Rubber Cases
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I was looking for a car mount for my phone that wasn’t bulky and discreet and this is exactly what i wanted. I have an Iphone 7 plus with an otter box case and it holds my phone great. It may slide down time to time but that’s only because I did not put the magnet on my phone directly on the car mount. If you want the hold to be perfect every time i suggest putting more magnets on the back of your phone. works great other wise.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but phone will get hot
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good mounts. Please note it seems there are two sizes on the backs of these, to make them more compatible with different size vents. So, if you feel they are fitting loose, take them off, turn them a bit, and then reinsert and see if that helps. Keep in mind that your phone WILL get hot, if you have the heat blowing. I usually adjust my phone so that the least amount of my phone is by the vent, but is still able to stay on the magnet. I used both magnets in the back of my phone. I just put the magnet underneath the inside of my case, no need to use the adhesive on the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally hands free easy cell phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Wow, finally after at lease a dozen auto cell phone holders which bent vents, fell off windshields, and othewise were a waste of money and time, here is a solution. Instructions are almost unnecessary. I stuck the one-inch magnet on the back of my Samsug J7 and then placed it against the quarter-size holder that goes into the vent. BINGO. Immediate firm attachment, and easy sticking into the vent. Why can't we have more simple, inexpensive solutions to drivers who all have the same challenges to just talk hands free?
customer_reviews.author: Writer BBeckham

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect! super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have an iphone 8, with a little card sticker holder in the back, holding 2 cards. I was afraid the magnet would not be able to hold with the two cards but it does! I didn't want the magnet to show, so it's right where the cards are, which is perfect! super easy to install, i didn't even need to use the sticky part of the magnet on my phone.. just put the magnet in and i was set. super cheap and works great! even comes with different size magnets
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Yim

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: Second set of these purchased as they eventually wear down due to temperature changes in Texas being anything from triple degree summer heat to 20o winters. For the price, it's easier to just repurchase than attempt to fix on your own. They have a very rigid system in place to prevent your phone from twisting too easily while attached to this device. Trust me, that's a good thing. These go on your air vents, which if you're using during the summer, you should keep closed to prevent overarming the mount and damaging your phone.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great. I am giving the extra one to someone I care about. It works better and easier than any clamp or clip product I have used. Holds secure over construction zone roads. I will be back for more when I need them. The other item I would like to address, is the processing, delivery, and follow up customer care. By there ability with this purchase, I am confident in any future purchases and recommend it and the company. I actually started this review a few days ago and forgot to hit the submit button. After using the product for a few days, I am buying another set to give to a couple of friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple product, effective, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had been using a cheaply made (but more expensive) plastic cradle to hold my phone. Switching to this was such a nice change of pace. The magnet is just the right strength to hold the phone sturdily in place but also slide away easily. I have an iPhone 7 so I don't have to worry about wireless charging. Super affordable for the simple and effective functionality. It does block the vent a little, but it's a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: ranchwilder

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mount
customer_reviews.text: These are great for their simplicity. I tried a CD mount that wouldn't grip and a deluxe clamping type vent mount that was too complicated and the phone flopped back and forth on my dash. This mount is perfect. I had concerns that the magnet would not be strong enough and I'd be picking the phone up off the floor all the time. That hasn't happened at all. With this mount you just stick it on the mount and it stays put. My only problem is that I have to buy another 2-pack because my wife wants to dump her clamp-style mount too!
customer_reviews.author: James, CA.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price does the job well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone holder for the price. It can be easily put on and taken off of car. It holds phones well except for one very large phone with a thick rubber case (which will occassionally fall loose when going through excessive potholes). The phone we tried with a thinner case held through the potholes. The magnet is unobtrusive especially if you attatch it to the case of the phone. It can also be used as a phone holder outside of the car which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective system!
customer_reviews.text: Simple system. Easy to add The thin, phone-side magnet piece inside my iPhone case. the air vent magnet has two sizes of slits to adapt to your car’s vents. I initially purchased a two-pack for use in our two vehicles. Just purchased another two-pack for use by passengers. Also great to take when renting cars on trips, because they adapt well to different vehicles and is small for limited stuff in your luggage or briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P.

customer_reviews.title: Holds phone great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and holds phone very well even on bumpy roads. Biggest complaint isn't with product it's with the metal piece and where to put it. I have mine attached to my case which works awesome however I recently bought a wireless charger and didn't realize I would have to take the case off everytime I wanted to use it cause the metal interferes with the charging. Minor annoyance but something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "suction" and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Have these for our iPhone 10s and they haven't dropped the phones once in our vehicles. They don't move much in our vents (2015 F150 and 2018 Highlander), and when our phones are "attached" to them the phones stay in place and when we're ready to use our phones they detach from the magnets very easily also. Great little phone holder (if you don't want wireless charging - which we will be changing over to soon). Very good though!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fall off
customer_reviews.text: I drive on roads with tons of potholes every day and this thing has not budged, but when I want to remove it it is not difficult. It can support the weight of a large iPhone, both vertically and horizontally. This is great for GPS or for easy access to changing songs played on the phone. I like that it comes with different magnet options, and that I don't have to actually adhere it to my phone or case but can just slip the magnetic sheet between them.
customer_reviews.author: ecrocs

customer_reviews.title: These magnet mounts are great. I was worried that the magnet might somehow ...
customer_reviews.text: These magnet mounts are great. I was worried that the magnet might somehow affect my phone battery but so far I have seen no difference in charging after several weeks of use. Some people said their phone was too heavy for them. I have an iphone 6s it seems to hold it great. I just put the magnet in the soft cover of my case instead of using the sticky part. The product loses one star for design. I always have the air conditioning on and it'll make your phone freezing cold next to the vent. I wish the clip fit somewhere else on my car that isn't the vent.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty phone keeper
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month now and it is holding up as good as on day 1. The magnet makes a very solid link with the air vent and the same goes for the magnet holding the phone. I have a heavy Note 5 and also drive a very low car with a firm suspension that is 2jzge powered. With that said the ride isnt always the smoothest. This thing can handle those steep G forces! Can't beat the value of the product for the price. Everyone that has asked me about it would have paid over $8 for the pack of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Juicebocs

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting these to work as well as they do for the price. They can’t be any easier to install in your car’s air vents. We didn’t attach the magnetic strips included to our phones but just left them inside our phone cases and they still work well. The phones have never fallen off on our rough country roads. I would definitely give these a try before purchasing a more expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine MurthaTop Contributor: Travel Guides & Tips

customer_reviews.title: these worked well in one car, and not so well in another - depends on the vents
customer_reviews.text: these worked well in one car, and not so well in another. the issue is that the grabber part is not deep. it helps if the vents are not round or curved because that keeps it from grabbing the full depth. also, you might not be able to orient your phone in the best direction because these sit flat on the vent - so it depends on the angle of your vent. . i.e. you can't swivel them the the best angle. there are 2 slots at 90° - one slot is wider than the other. In my cars, then thinner slot grabs the inner vanes.
customer_reviews.author: measuretwice

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the car
customer_reviews.text: This clip and magnet are very secure. I was very skeptical about it being secure and concerned about it breaking my car vent but I was wrong. The steadiness while driving is so surprising. There is very little vibration while driving. My vent is still in tact after months of use. While I was not happy about sticking a magnet directly to my phone I am happy with the outcome. My cover is over the phone and the vent magnet works through the cover. I hardly ever see the magnet on the back of my phone because of the cover. You can’t tell it’s even there. This is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Always Shopping Andria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My step kids bought me the one that is placed on the dash board with adhesive... I dare not do that to my two cars but loved the idea of the magnet so I purchased this set. Keeps my phone exactly where I put it and the vents stay normal!
customer_reviews.author: cju747

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hurt my hands to get my phone on and off
customer_reviews.text: The clamp holder hurt my hands when I had to pry it apart to get it opened wide enough and then push in my phone. Getting it out wasn't much easier. Now, I just place my phone on the magnetic pad and lift it off when I am done. I had to put blue tape on my vent because the clamp holder kept falling off. The prongs on this holder are much tighter, although the blue tape is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend :)
customer_reviews.text: So I got this and instantly attached the magnet onto my phone. I tried it out and the suction, even through my phone case, is strong. I feel like it is going to be secure but also easy to pull my phone off of the magnet when I need to. It is the right amount of suction. It also fit great on my car vent- I was impressed at that- I was a little worried if it would be sturdy on my car vent but this checks all the boxes and isn’t too bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and high quality car mount
customer_reviews.text: This send to be a quality product and works well. I put the metal plates between my phones and their cases without using the adhesive. The magnet is strong and the mount was secure in the A/C vent. This makes it really convenient to mount a phone, and I'll definitively use this in rental cars while traveling. It does block the airflow a bit, but not significantly. Full disclosure: I purchased this as a gift from the manufacturer, and might not have purchased otherwise, because I have a dashboard mount in one car. However, I'm glad I did, because it's a great product and more useful than I realized (and my dash mount falls off about every 4 months).
customer_reviews.author: JLITT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These work much better than other holders we’ve tried that just held the phone by squeezing it—those were constantly coming loose from the vent. My phone case has a zipper pocket for credit cards on the back, so there was no way the magnet could work through that. I tried hot gluing it to the back, and it fell off after sitting on the magnet for just a few minutes. Gorilla Glue did the trick. So it doesn’t look great, but it works great, and that’s all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I must not have read the fine print and saw that there are 2 of these! But that was a pleasant surprise! This is perfect for my car vent. Our roads aren’t the greatest with tons of pot holes but my phone didn’t pop off when I hit one! My drink did but not this. The one thing I do love is that my phone is secure and stays on while driving but it’s so easy to slide off when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and so easy to use. I have them in every car, and every driver has a magnetic plate in their phone. Keeps the phone in front of me so I can see without having to reach for it. The only issue with these is that they do block a vent. And some vents accommodate them better than others. But I am using them in four different vehicles in the vents (2 hondas, 1 buick, 1 kia).
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the car.
customer_reviews.text: Really works well and makes putting your phone up at dash level to use as a GPS easy as can be and very *practical*. It also has the additional benefit of putting your phone in line with the vent. The AC just plane stops over heating issues when using your phone as a GPS while also charging. Hint, use the tighter side of the vent holder as the larger notch doesn't grab as well.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY ELLER

customer_reviews.title: Great phone holder if your phone isn't heavy
customer_reviews.text: These came in a pack of 2 with 4 different stickers (round or rectangular). One problem I found was that the sticky side couldn't carry the weight of my friend's phone which is an iPhone 6 with a small case holding 4 ID/credit cards. So the magnet would work so well that the sticky side would separate. After some finagling we finally got it to work, but this definitely works best with lighter phones/cases.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are small and don’t block too much air (certainly less blockage than with some other products I’ve seen). There are adjustable slots depending on your vent size. The magnets it come with work pretty well but I also used a different magnet for awhile and it also worked fine. My only recommendation is that you consider the shape of your dash. I have a Honda Crosstour, so the slant of the dashboard makes my iPhone XS Max hard to fit on the vent without pushing the air conditioning buttons. Kind of annoying, but more my car’s design than the product. Also, I love that there are several magnets that come with this and in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lea

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Had similar product but lost magnetic plate when removed protective cover an forgot it was there. Found these Magnetic Mount, WizGear [2 PACK] Universal Air Vent Magnetic Car Mount Phone Holder on Amazon with a attractive price. Arrived in time. Like the idea on having a choice of using a small found metal plate of a larger rectangular one. I preferred the larger rectangular plate tho. The magnetic mounts fit my air vents in my car an truck well. Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gluck

customer_reviews.title: should be HUNTER ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: I love these magnets. They perform exactly as advertised. I cannot drive a rental car (using cellphone based navigation) without one. The problem is, every time a return a rental car I leave my phone magnet in the AC vent. I am here buying a 5th pair for the next time I travel. Maybe if they were hunter orange I would notice them when leaving the rental car.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbow

customer_reviews.title: Not for Mercedes or iPhone XS Max
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, these have a very hard time attaching to the circular vents on Mercedes Benz. Once I was able to finally install them (by using a piece from my old car mount) they wouldn’t hold my iPhone XS Max. I guess the phone was too heavy even with using 2 magnets 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mount is awesome!! Magnet is the strongest
customer_reviews.text: Mount is awesome!! Magnet is the strongest. Rubber material used is very smooth to ensure it doesn't scratch the phone. Great size, very convenient. Two issues though that are not related to the product specs: 1. Phone won't wirelessly charge if you have the metal plate, however i just put the metal plate a little bit towards the top of the phone and charging worked fine. 2. The magnet is sooo strong that sometimes while puling the phone the mount comes us with it, however its different from one car to another depending on the design of your AC vent.
customer_reviews.author: Amr Youssef

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected. The magnetic is super strong and holds your phone in place. The only down side is that it doesn't swivel or allow you to angle your phone screen towards you. So if your vent faces straight to the back, that's the angle you'll be viewing your phone. For me to angle my phone screen at me, I couldn't place the magnetic all the way in the vent to allow a slight angle.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Only Car Mount I have found to work in my Truck
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cell phone car mount I have ever found. Due to the size of the vents in my truck, I could never find anything that would work. This is the first one. I liked it so much, that I bought one for each of our grown kids as they are always complaining about not having a good one. My only complaint would be is that you can only order 1 set at a time and we needed 8 for kids and their spouses. So had to order each one separately over the course of a week to give them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

product_meta.title: Maxboost Car Mount, [2 Pack] Universal Air Vent Magnetic Phone Car Mounts Holder for iPhone 11 Pro Xs Max XR X 8 7 Plus 6, Galaxy S20 Ultra S10 S10e 5G S9,LG,Note 10 /Mini Tablet(Compatible Most Case)
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC MOUNT - Simple design slips right into the air vent and magnetically attaches your cell phone with the pre-installed metal plate on the back, or the any protective case. The universal magnetic car mount feature 4 powerful magnets built into the mount head ensure your phone stay securely when you are driving. (Thicker phone cases may interfere with magnetic adhesion)

OPTIMAL USAGE - For direct mounting of metal plates to phone, use the included protection film provided BEFORE placing the metal plate. Then, place the metal plate over the film to prevent any damage to the device by the adhesive tape.

COMPACT DESIGN: The reinforced dual-sized claw allow a perfect fit with almost any air vent. The rubberized exterior increase grip and keep your car’s air vent scratch-free. Easy to remove, the iPhone car mount can easily be stored in a glove box during times of non-use.

NO HASSLE MOUNT: Magnetic design means, no cradles, brackets, clamps or gel and sticky residue. Eliminates the unsightly features of most car mounts. (NOTE: Metal plates will interfere with wireless charging capabilities. Remove the metal page before using a wireless charge) Compatible with all smartphones, iPhone, Galaxy, HTC, Xperia, Nokia, LG, Nexus, Pixel.

Versatile Viewing: Highly-flexible rotation provides infinite viewing angles. Position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safer drive. Maxboost car mount comes with 12-months warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars19,327 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Magnetic Flat Stick Car mount works with most phone and its case and most flat surface.
